# 4. Connecting RStudio to GitHub

## Create a Personal Access Token (PAT) on GitHub

```{r}
# install.packages("usethis")
# library(usethis)
create_github_token()
```

## Store Personal Access Token to Connect RStudio and GitHub

```{r}
# install.packages("gitcreds")
library(gitcreds)
gitcreds_set()
```
